abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32223077, pmid32208987, pmid32107119, pmid32232976, pmid32232429, pmid32232648, pmid32232837, pmid32232980, pmid32233018, pmid32215952, pmid32232986
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.04.01
